about_the_game:
LoopCraft is a game that players will enjoy with the system to create items. Creating items will have both self-created or set up a semi-automatic plant. And have help from friends to send/sell raw materials as ingredients in the production of products. Since players set up factories in different areas, players are given different resources.

Feature

  • Craft system
  • Build a factory to produce items
  • Buy / Sell / Auction land
  • Finding raw materials to produce items
  • Trading system
  • Fight with monsters to receive special items to upgrade character skills
  • Blueprint systems
  • Quest system
  • Friend system
  • Party and Guild system
  • Costume system
  • Pet system
  • Mini-game system

short_description: Loop Craft is a game about economics. There is an item trading system within the game. This game has a variety of item mix systems. And have a reservation system to set up a factory to produce products for sale in the game.
